item.description:
Art Blakey Ensemble: "This swinging, hard-driving ensemble from Berklee College of Music recreates the arrangements of such composers as Wayne Shorter, Cedar Walton, Benny Golson, and James Williams. Bass, drums, piano, and horns combine for a toe-tapping, danceable experience."


Come for music at the Gardner!

.... at the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum.   An evening of music, and art.  Art and Art. And of course a visit to the museum courtyard in the middle of winter is a treat all by itself!  Touring the courtyard after dark with live classic musical filling the air is a special treat!

 

 

 

And jazz!   This time the

Art Blakey Ensemble

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Gardner After Hours Program

 

Jazz at the Gardner is also part of Gardner After Hours, and the Art Blakey Ensemble performs tonight. Tickets to Jazz at the Gardner concerts are sold separately, but include admission to Gardner After Hours.

 

 

For information on getting tickets to the
Art Blakely Ensemble , in the modern Calderwood Hall:
http://www.gardnermuseum.org/calendar/events/4129/

 

Note tickets to the Ensemble concert include admission to the museum and to the
Gardner After Dark events.  I'll be going to the Art Blakely Ensemble concert.

 

Or:

 

For those who prefer just the Gardner After Hours tickets, see:


http://www.gardnermuseum.org/calendar/events/4205
item.how_to_find_us: Just head on in and enjoy!
item.name: Art Blakey Ensemble & Isabella after hours....
